meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>needle</kanji> made of <kanji>gold</kanji> is a <vocabulary>wire</vocabulary>. Perhaps wires were made from gold mostly back in the day? And they were thin like needles? That's my guess.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi reading of both. You already know both of these, just watch out for the rendaku on 金!
